channel.title: Blogs on creikey

item.title: Setting Up Website
item.description: Synopsis Using hugo to create a website is very easy, as shown in these steps I followed the hugo quick start guide And the introduction theme’s instructions Steps Installing hugo Because arch linux has a wide breadth of supported programs in it’s repos, I was able to simply run: sudo pacman -S hugo And use the hugo new site website command to create the website in a folder named website/
